scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Saint Christopher wading through a body of water, carrying the Christ Child on his shoulders. Saint Christopher is depicted as a large, bearded man with a red cloak over a blue tunic, carrying a staff. The Christ Child, with a halo, is seated on his shoulder, raising a hand in blessing. On the left, a woman in a red robe and black veil stands with her hands clasped in prayer. On the right, a figure in a black robe stands with hands clasped. The background features rocky outcrops and foliage, with a bright blue sky above. The scene is framed by an ornamental border.
